title: get_afni_model_PRF_6
description: A command to invoke AFNI's population receptive field (pRF) model

NT.title: Time Points (NT)
NT.description: Number of time points of the stimulus dataset.

X.title: X Center (x)
X.description: X coordinate of the pRF center.

Y.title: Y Center (y)
Y.description: Y coordinate of the pRF center.

SIGMA.title: Sigma (sigma)
SIGMA.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian pRF.

SIGRAT.title: Sigma Ratio (sigrat)
SIGRAT.description: Ratio of standard deviations (sigma_x/sigma_y) of the Gaussian pRF.

THETA.title: Theta (theta)
THETA.description: Rotation angle theta of the Gaussian pRF.
